fabric.dissemination.pastry.messages

Class DataOutputBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fabric.dissemination.pastry.messages.DataOutputBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.DataOutput

    public class DataOutputBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.DataOutput
    A class to merge DataOutput and OutputBuffer. Unfortunately, pastry introduced the OutputBuffer interface which is almost like a DataOutput, but isn't.
